main.title: Trader list
main.subTitle: Hourly data update
main.followerHint:
Followers/Max.Followers
The maximum number of followers is affected by the trader's account equity, and users who have followed successfully will not be affected.
main.balanceHint: The data displayed is the total asset of the trader in the Unified Futures account, all currencies have been converted to USDT.

becomeTrader.agreementText: I have read carefully and agree to the Trader Agreement
becomeTrader.title: Apply to become a trader
becomeTrader.hint_1: After submitting the application, our staff will get in touch with you as soon as possible, please provide the corresponding application materials as required
becomeTrader.hint_2: Note that during the review period, please ensure that the following conditions do not exist, otherwise the review will fail: positions, open orders, current plans, and following traders
becomeTrader.hint_3: When the trader's profit sharing ratio is adjusted, the 'expected profit' displayed on the copy page will also be adjusted accordingly.

traderInfo.setCopyTradeOrderHint: Follower can only follow your copy trade futures

followModeText.multiplier: Orders placed each time is {{value}} times orders placed by the trader

followModeTooltip.fixedAmount: it represents the margin cost of each copy. If you set BTCUSDT to follow a fixed amount of 100USDT, when a trader opens a position, you will invest 100USDT as a margin to open the position.
followModeTooltip.fixedQuantity: it represents the number of positions copied each time. If you set BTCUSDT to follow a fixed amount of 0.1BTC, when a trader opens a position, you will start follow him by opening a position of 0.1BTC.
followModeTooltip.multiplier: Orders placed each time is -- times orders placed by the trader

hint.fixedAmount: Represents the cost of margin per copy trade
hint.fixedQuantity: Represents the number of positions per copy trade
hint.multiplier: Represents a multiplier relationship between each copied trade and the trader

placeHolder.maxFollow: Please input max. copy trade amount(1-50000)
